entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException when trying to create an algorithm instance (Aes.Create) in Blazor #60897
  • net6.0-android app crashes in release mode when instantiating HttpClient #60896
  • Share RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar logic with SymbolicRegexMatcher #60885
    7.0.0
  • Port PackageValidation flaky build failure fixes to 6.0 #60883
  • IBinaryNumber interface does not have an "AllBitsSet" property #60882
    7.0.0
  • PlatformNotSupportedException - On Windows while using the `.UseWindowsService()` #60875
  • Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #60870
    7.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of MemoryExtensions.IndexOf(..., span) #60866
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Tests.TranscodingStreamTests.ReadAsync_Memory(bufferLength: 1) failing in CI #60865
  • Resolve differences between string.IndexOfAny and MemoryExtensions.IndexOfAny #60864
    7.0.0
  • WebAssembly <NativeFileReference> isn't included in VS's fast up-to-date check #60862
  • [API Proposal]: IWritableOptionsMonitor #60858
  • SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync() begin fire TimeoutException on TaskScheduler.UnobservedTaskException in net6.0? #60856
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_RandomAccess #60869
  • .NET 6 C++/CLI runtime generates InvalidProgramException when large stack-allocated variables are used #60852
  • Issues with manipulating filesystem entries that are symlinks #60851
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\GCBench\\gcbench\\gcbench.cmd #60850
  • Test failure SelfContained_NetCoreApp3_CompatMode_SingleFile_APITests #60849

Closed

  • Test failure Color.RedirectedOutputDoesNotUseAnsiSequences #60819
    7.0.0
  • SizeConst of MarshalAs(ByValTStr) loaded by MetadataLoadContext always returns zero. #57815
    7.0.0
  • Stack<T> should implement IReadOnlyList<T> #29915
    Future
  • Build for System.Runtime fails within VS #40159
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect date format in Windows 10 and Windows 11 #60845
    7.0.0
  • Unhandled exception in Interop.Sys.AllocNullTerminatedArray while starting a process #44034
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: CancellationTokenRegistration.OnUnregisteredWithoutInvoke(Action) #60843
  • QuicConnection.AcceptStreamAsync throws incorrect exception on browser close #60133
    6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Should QuicConnection.Dispose abort? #60235
    7.0.0
  • Libraries packaging should support including roslyn generated documentation xml file #54761
    7.0.0
  • Add a pairing heap to System.Collections.Specialized #28708
    Future
  • API review for QUIC APIs #48686
    7.0.0
  • Consider collapsing libraries reference and source projects #37961
    7.0.0
  • 'The "Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility.ValidatePackage" task failed unexpectedly' in libs legs #59908
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions (5.0.0) #46584
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting solution file does not build properly in VS #50246
    7.0.0
  • Json.Serialization.Converters.DictionaryDefaultConverter ignores custom converters for Enum keys. #60079
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging solution can't be built from Visual Studio #54740
    Future
  • "9009" exit code error #57029
    Future
  • Onboarding work for .NET 7 #57587
    7.0.0
  • ILLinkTrimAssembly condition applies to NetCoreAppCurrent only #58343
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some typos in corhdr.h #60895
    community-contribution
  • Fix Equals overload logic for some methods of an array created using MLC #60894
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [mono][workloads] Workload 7.0.100 #60893
    area-System.Net
  • Fix a thread local test #60892
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fix UnobservedTaskException from SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync #60890
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 7.0.0
  • Add configureonly option to host native build #60889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use IndexOf(..., span) in Regex FindFirstChar #60888
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • release/6.0.1: Preserve last error in call-counting stubs #60887
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • JIT: refactor jump threading to prepare for allowing side effects #60884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Disable package validation in source-build for reliability #60881
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Extract various changes from the invoke and custom marshaler PRs #60877
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • Allow for multiple copies of the same ModuleId to be found in iteration #60874
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging blazor app after ts changes. #60873
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixes Broken Link to .NET Forums #60867
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix for #60340 #60863
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Allow nfloat to be in the ObjCRuntime namespace, and make it work for Xamarin.MacCatalyst.dll as well. #60861
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-mono, os-maccatalyst, 6.0.1
  • Fix time-of-use vs. time-of-check "bugs" #60860
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer assemblies to code coverage #60859
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow nfloat to be in the ObjCRuntime namespace, and make it work for Xamarin.MacCatalyst.dll as well. #60854

Merged

  • Fix libs.tests build with gcc #60757
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Preserve last error in call-counting stubs #60886
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • SizeConst of MarshalAs(ByValTStr) loaded by MetadataLoadContext always returns zero #60714
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Disable SOD Pizza AOT Blazor test #60876
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update slngen and solution files #60871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix wrong property use in resolveContract.targets #60868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Distinguish callsite and callee VM-no-inline failure messages #60661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #60275
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] Stop flagging methods with well-known unsupported types for conversion #60841
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Update compatibility package and unpin compiler version #60847
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Process: throw ArgumentNullException when ArgumentList contains a null. #59562
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Fix DGML debug tests for Regex NonBacktracking #60853
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use preferred region from PAL for JIT reloc hints #60747
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use SDK-selected runtime in IL SDK #60400
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Up retry for ETXTBSY #60741
  • [DllImportGenerator] Skip unit tests that hit exceptions due to roslyn-sdk#590 #60848
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Break up mono_metadata_parse_type_internal #60725
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement System.Array functions used by MD arrays as intrinsics #60816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor Regex FindFirstChar #60822
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix more alloc-dealloc mismatches #60691
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Explicitly emit a diagnostic for ref returns in GeneratedDllImport stubs. #60720
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Remove some redundant threading tests, move some cases to libraries tests #59073
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc build improvements #60701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] PInvokeTableGenerator: Fixup symbol names with invalid chars #60814
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change code generation strategy for ILEmitResolverBuilder #60831
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • always populate TargetHostName on SslStream #60589
    area-System.Net.Security
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Properly type primary selectors in `fgMemoryVNForLoopSideEffects` #60505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #60835
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Make memory mapped stress log work for child processes. #60828
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Prototype mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Implement tailcalls #59799
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: "Scaled" addressing mode on ARM #60808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • ci test #59222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Add support for "byref of any type" to the type system #60571
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution
  • Setting nullable string properties from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #60842
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][EXPERIMENT] [wasm][aot] link with O1 #60739
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][jit] Add a micro optimization to fill_runtime_generic_context (). #60839
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • IFormatProvider getter refactor #60815
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Disable DllImportGenerator tests on s390x #60833
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, arch-s390x
  • Clean-up crossgen's NuGet dependencies et. al. #59914
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Update nativeaot.md with advisory for EMCC_DEBUG #1680

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Improve the build setup a little #1672
  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1679

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet SDK discovery accepts empty folders as valid SDKs #22322
  • The Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility package is missing a package description #22320
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • VS 2015 support for ns2.0 causes conflicts with ref assembly facades #1539
    Backlog
  • Verify whether build logic for .NET Standard support needs to be added to Mono/Xamarin #1627
    3.0.1xx
  • [Product construction] SDK should overlay nuget onto the CLI LKG used for testing #1744
    3.0.1xx
  • Investigate dotnet store running package resolution in parallel on same project #2160
    3.0.1xx
  • Building a project between two different SDKs fails hard if you reuse nodes #2161
    3.0.1xx
  • ResolvePackageFileConflicts should normalize file paths #2331
    3.0.1xx
  • ResolvePackageAssets (and design-time build) fails badly inside VS if you have a project with malformed or empty target framework #2363
    3.0.1xx
  • Link for .NET Framework to non built-in .NET standard warning needs to point to actual content #2398
    3.0.1xx
  • Update CLI and revert implicit netcoreapp version workaround #2416
    3.0.1xx
  • Missing LatestPatchVersionForNetCore2_1 #2446
    3.0.1xx
  • Better diagnostics for misspelled `TargetFramework(Identifier|Version)?` #2461
    3.0.1xx
  • [Question] How to build SDK with specific version? (e.g. generate v5.0.401 but not v5.0.401-dev) #22332
  • Advertise the dynamic VS/SDK install folder change #9842
    3.0.1xx
  • Mac builds fail on "Hosted macOS" agent pool #2624
    3.0.1xx
  • Just installed the 2.2 preview 3 sdk - fails with MSB4018 #2635
    3.0.1xx
  • Duplicate embedded resource error for EmbeddedResource with different LogicalNames #2657
    3.0.1xx
  • Improve testing of PreserveCompilationContext with approximation of what Razor does for runtime compilation #2828
    3.0.1xx
  • ReferenceManagerAssemblies is hidden from .NETCoreApp but not .NETStandard #2996
    3.0.1xx
  • Adding User Experience for creating WinMDs on .NET Core #3042
    3.0.1xx
  • Internal error: new deps file generation logic did not produce the same result as the old logic #3146
    3.0.1xx
  • migrate newtonsoft.json to system.text.json in RegFreeComManifest.cs and ClsidMap.cs #3081
    3.0.1xx
  • Error when trying to run myWebApp #22328
  • The previous project cannot be run after upgrading to from .NET 6.0 RC2 arm64 to RTM arm64. #22125
  • .Net SDK 6.0 RC2 has incorrect editor config files for AnalysisLevel 5 #22276
  • Cannot find dotnet/clicommandlineparser in the feed #10230
    3.0.1xx
  • Entering an unrecognized TFM crashes ResolvePackageAssets task during design-time builds #3286
    3.0.1xx
  • Change all aspnet feed #10314
    3.0.1xx
  • flaky test "It_stores_when_targeting_netcoreapp3" #3351
    3.0.1xx
  • Condition out NETStandard.Library.NETFramework for source-build #10372
    3.0.1xx
  • Preview link points to an unhelpful page #10386
    3.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22334
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tool install implicit RIDs #22331
    Area-Tools

Merged

  • Fix compatibility task paths in props and targets #22318
    Area-Compatibility

Updated

  • Add implicit RIDs when not specified on self contained option #22314
    Area-CLI
  • [NOMERGE]Argument BC(--r/--a), add support for `--arch` #22180
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Navigation Bar shows wrong current method in VB project #57401
  • CSharpSquiggles tests are failing on .Net Core Servicehub host #57395
  • Revisit assembly layering fix for .NET SDK #57387
  • .rtf license files in nuget packages flagged as security risk #57385
  • Ability to know in Source Generators whether called from Build or from VS intellisense (design-time) #57384
  • System.NullReferenceException: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.GreenNode.GetFirstTerminal(...) returned null. #57381
  • Add the title, category and description fields into build diagnostics reported in error list #57377
  • ReplacePropertyWithMethodsCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #57376

Closed

  • Subsumption checking doesn't work on type patterns in combinators #51192
    17.1
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Features dependency is not source-buildable #57270
    17.1
  • Flaky integration tests with 17.0p5 #57237
    17.1
  • CS8600: possible null assignment false positive when 'is true' is in the expression #57382
  • CS0165 error on conditional expression with `is true` #57383
  • Inconsistent val escape for extended property patterns #57209
    17.1
  • tripple slash comments do not respect editorconfig line endings setting #37292
    Backlog
  • Make sure Sort Usings uses the current line endings #19306
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Race in LSP document tracker when accessing tracked documents from non-mutating handlers #57276
    17.1.P1

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57399
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Upgrade xunit to get newer asserts #57398
    Area-Compilers
  • Update documentation to explain FullyQualifiedFormat behavior #57397
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use VS2022 images when building Roslyn in CI #57396
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add clean tasks for unix and windows #57393
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Switch to 1ES build pools release/dev17.0" #57391
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57389
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57388
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [LSP] Switch to project version caching instead of sln crawler events pull diagnostics #57380
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57378
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix param-nullchecking build/test failures #57375
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.1 #57371
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Skip failing tests on Core host #57394
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Fix races in tests for LspWorkspaceManager by waiting for workspace operations on creation #57339
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • DecisionDagBuilder.CheckConsistentDecision - Improve relationship check for tests under examination. #57345
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Have tagger wait on the OOP host having a complete compilation rather than waiting for the local host to have it. #57290
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57390
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [LSP] Add feature flag to enable LSP classifications in local scenarios #57291
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, LSP
  • Fix assembly layering for .NET SDK #57386
    Area-Interactive
  • [LSP] Fix race in document change tracker when used in non-mutating requests. #57317
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, LSP
  • Unskip BasicGenerateConstructorDialog.VerifyReordering #57363
    Area-IDE
  • Unskip BasicGenerateConstructorDialog.VerifyDeselect #57364
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Compute val escape for extended property patterns #57211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns, Next
  • snap 17.1p1 #57367
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57374
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57373
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add diags to help us diagnose lightbulb issues better #57312
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57379
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Use correct line endings when sorting imports #57365
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Binder.CreateConversion - Report use-site diagnostics for the entire conversion hierarchy. #57175
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Disable async lightbulbs for 17.0 #57169
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, Needs UX Triage

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.1 #57403
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix deadlock while opening a solution that already had files open #57402
    Area-IDE
  • Interpolated string handler IOperation support #56276
    Area-Analyzers
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens benchmarks + improve edit algorithm #57231
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Update TextSpan.cs #57300
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch to calling into IAsyncLightBulbSession directly to avoid polling. #57316
    Area-IDE
  • handle null project paths in solution #57234
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Options refactoring #57139
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: IOperation #56008
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • adding draft of detailed spec #57346
    Area-IDE
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Compute val escape for list patterns #57336
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor wasm hosted Project Integrity errors on Deployment to Azure App service #37861
  • Slow to load pages post controller completing #37860
  • VS2022 RC2 Brand new Blazor project doesn't run #37858
  • Consider not registering JQueryFormValueProviderFactory by default #37857
  • Consider adding support for endpoint filters (WIP) #37853
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Publish of a hosted Blazor WASM project fails #37852
  • Consider Integrating IResult into the request pipeline #37851
    .NET 7 Planning
  • SPA proxy not loading pls help #37850
  • VS2022 RC2 Blazor exception handling issues #37849
  • Blazor WebAssembly HttpClient wrong response - StatusCode: 0 #37845
  • MVC @model directive should respect the nullability of the type supplied #37844
  • RoleStore.SaveChanges(CancellationToken cancellationToken) should be protected #37842
  • BL0004 ("Component parameter should be public") error should also accept internal #37840
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: mvc #37839
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #37838
  • . net 6 blazor release compression problem #37836
  • [HTTP/3] Better handle connection close by browser #37835

Closed

  • NET 6.0 React SPA template - consider adding an onError handler to setupProxy.js to prevent websocket connection crashes #35155
    7.0-preview1
  • blazor client calls server api and gets 404 not found #37859
  • SetDoNotCacheHeaders overwrites cache headers #3058
    Backlog
  • Load BlazorWebView HostPage from embedded resource #37823
  • HTTP/2 and HTTP/3: Response trailers collection not reset #34411
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Content Type x-www-form-urlencoded in API call causes 500 Error #19880
    Backlog
  • Support top level programs with MVC #23467
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ModelMetadataType doesn't work with Web API project #25197
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Incorrect self-closing script tag leads to poor error experience #37832
  • Support integration tests for top level programs #26173
    Backlog
  • Scroll Virtualize component to index #37847
  • Hot Reload doesn't detect (rude) edit when adding new `builder.service.AddHttpClient` #37833
  • Design notes: Unifying design and runtime razor builds #37494
    Discussions
  • [IGNORE THIS ISSUE] Testing Automation #37846
    6.0.x
  • Provide a way to Customize WebApplicationBuilder Defaults #37843
  • Trivial application has non-zero CPU usage on Linux #37796
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Webaudio api in blazor #37719
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #37803
  • CallStopAsyncOnRequestThread_DoesNotHangIndefinitely hang #30149
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37848
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Ensure view caches are cleared when RazorHotReload.ClearCache is invo… #37856
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Ensure view caches are cleared when RazorHotReload.ClearCache is invoked #37854
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.0
  • 34411 HTTP/2 and HTTP/3: Response trailers collection not reset #37627
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37834
    7.0-preview1
  • Add listener for QUIC logs to HTTP/3 sample #37837
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [Helix] Switch to win11 for pr checks #37712
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Re-quarantine IHttpActivityFeatureIsPopulated #37830
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix IHost being disposed of twice #37631
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ForeignKey on Entity without primary key #26468
  • How to create foreign keys using fluent API and Value Convertors #26465
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Index was out of range when using AsSplitQuery() #26464
  • Why are Temporal Period properties required to be shadow properties? #26463
    7.0.0
  • Recursive CTE call in FromSqlRaw OR FromSqlInterpolated doesn't work in EF Core 5.0 #26462

Closed

  • Scaffolding a new migration with a custom operation type #26413
  • SqlNullabilityProcessor and COALESCE with more than two arguments #26344
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-ef CLI does not build dotnet user-secrets #26466
  • Idea / Feature Suggestion - Model First Development #26467
  • Self-referencing relationship breaks in `6.0.0-rc.2.21480.5` #26456
  • Table splitting and generated columns (specifically full text search) #26423
  • How to check if an entity is already being tracked by Ef Core? #26385
  • deps.json does not exists after update-databse in package manager console #26314
  • Database connection fails when the password is changed, but works when the application is restarted #26264
  • System.TypeInitializationException: The type initializer for 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.QueryableMethods' threw an exception. #25182
  • [Bug] Migrations "Could not drop constraint." exception after earlier foreign key exception during "Update-Database" #26453

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #26344 - SqlNullabilityProcessor and COALESCE with more than two arguments #26419

Updated

  • Check and update service lifetime docs #26445
  • Add Migration name check #26396
  • [6.0.1] Query: Copy client projections when updating SelectExpression #26431
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • [6.0.1] Register design-time LoggerFactory as Scoped #26460
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
